articles.title: Jaylen Brown Fined $35,000 After Blasting NBA Officials
articles.summary:
Boston Celtics star Jaylen Brown was hit with a $35,000 fine by the NBA on Monday for publicly ripping the officiating after Boston‚Äôs 100-95 loss to the San Antonio Spurs. The league announced the penalty after Brown criticized referees both in his postgame media availability and on social media. What Brown Said After the Game [‚Ä¶]
